text: Efrem Zimbalist may refer to: *Efrem Zimbalist, Sr. (1889 or 1890–1985), Russian-American violinist, composer, teacher and conductor, father of Efrem Zimbalist, Jr. *Efrem Zimbalist, Jr. (1918–2014), American actor, son of Efrem Zimbalist, Sr. *Efrem Winters, full name Efrem Zimbalist Winters, American college basketball player *Efrem Zimbalist Stringfellow, University of Illinois track & field athlete
title: Efrem Zimbalist
